Some women seem to bloom in their early-thirties. For instance, Tracy has bloomed into an utterly beautiful woman. My cousin thinks that if a woman without makeup still looks pretty, then she's pretty. And there shouldn't be a big difference between with makeup and without. Not every man's type of women is the same. Of course, everybody likes handsome and beautiful people. In terms of appearance, some men like petite women, some like svelte women, some like sporty women, some like them tall amd thin, some like them well-rounded and curvaceous, some like them voluptuous, some like full bust, some like wide hips, some like shapely legs, some like silky feet and so on. In terms of personality, some men like kind-hearted amd helpful women, some like vivacious women, some like them compassionate, some like them talkative and sociable, some like them quiet, some like them tactful amd diplomatic, some like to be controlled amd dominated and so forth. My friend Simon is a fan of Tracy Zhu and Samantha Gao, both of whom are exquisitely beautiful women. Like him, they both have an exquisite taste in fashion, shoes, food, interior and exterior design. Both of them are glamorous women who always dress up in glamorous outfits. They rarely dress down. I once saw Tracy dress up in eighties clothing for a party while Samantha was in superman costume. Both of them have a glamorous job amd career. I consider acting a worthwhile career. By the way, I don't think my friend Simon needs to dress up to go to work. A polo shirt and shorts are fine. Just dress down to go to work.
